MainPage.title: Be One with the Future
MainPage.body: Academie One is a college-level, tution-free, computer programming institution with a peer-to-peer learning environment. Learn the skills you need here to begin your career as a Software Engineer.

PageName.title: Foundation
PageName.body: Foundation is a science fiction novel by American writer Isaac Asimov. It is the first published in his Foundation Trilogy (later expanded into the Foundation Series). Foundation is a cycle of five interrelated short stories, first published as a single book by Gnome Press in 1951.

Message.title: Message
body: Academie One is a modern and international programming school, created for adults at any age searching for self-development or retraining opportunities.

Starting from 2023, 200 new IT specialists will enter the job market every year. Besides offering a high-level education and creating top-level specialists, the school aims to develop local entrepreneurship and create new jobs to the region.
The school will help to reduce the lack of software engineers in Kazakhstan, offer an innovative addition to regular schools and strengthen our educational system.
It’s a contribution to the diversification of the region and the development of digital competences.

Academie One creates a strong base for further studies at universities and working at technology companies. The school operates on a cloud-based learning platform, where each student moves at their own pace, solving the tasks set by the system, linking theory to practice. There’s no tuition fee for the students.

Model.title: Educational Model
Model.body: This unique method has its roots in 20 years of research and experimentation by Nicolas Sadirak and his team in the field of IT education.

items.title: Peer-to-Peer Learning
items.body: No lessons, no teachers, no grades: at Academie One, students are accountable for their success. Cadets, while training, work as a collective mind.

items.title: Gamification And Progression
items.body: The learning process is presented in the form of game levels. The first completed projects allow you to unlock others, more significant and with even greater rewards.

items.title: Personalized Learning
items.body: Each person progresses at their own pace. Certain tasks are solved quickly, while others require additional effort. The program adapts to each student.

PageName.title: Academie
body: «I have your record here, captain—complete. You are forty-three and have been an Officer of the Armed Forces for seventeen years. You were born in Loris, of Anacreonian parents, no serious childhood diseases, an attack of myo . . . well, that’s of no importance . . . education, premilitary, at the Academy of Sciences, major, hyper-engines, academic standing . . . hm-m-m, very good, you are to be congratulated . . . entered the Army as Under-Officer on the one hundred second day of the 293rd year of the Foundation Era.»
Excerpt from the book: Isaac Asimov. «Foundation and Empire».

Concept.title: Concept
Concept.title2: High quality education for everyone who wants to challenge.
Concept.body: Academie One believes that we should provide high-quality education to those who want to take on challenges, regardless of their educational background or profession. The entire educational model is based on peer-to-peer collaboration: a collaboration that allows developers to unleash their full creativity through collaborative work on projects.

items.title: Accessible
items.body: Anyone over the age of 18 can study at Academie One, with no previous knowledge in the field or any other prerequisites necessary. Upon application, students are given a logic-based test. If successful, students can move to the next step.

items.title: Flexible
items.body: With revolutionary educational program, students work on projects that interest them in close collaboration with their peers. The Education cluster will be open 7 days a week, 24 hours a day, so cadets will be able to attend classes according to their personal schedule.

items.title: Career
items.body: The Academie engages cadets in a 4-year collaboration, which includes 2 years of study and 2 years of career development, working on projects in an IT company, after which students become high-quality coders.

Map.title: Part of the 01 Edu System
Map.body: Nicolas Sadirac's new educational platform for high-level training in code and innovation. 01 Edu System presents an innovative curriculum in software engineering and programming. With a renowned industry-leading reputation, the curriculum has been rigorously designed for learning skills of the digital world and technology industry. Taking a different approach than the classic teaching methods today, learning is facilitated through a collective and co-créative process in a professional environment.

Campus.title: Campus
body: We are located in an old refurbished historical tea packing factory. Feel free to get a seat in our cluster equipped with 500 IMacs, play some games in the gaming area, grab yourself your peer and discuss your thoughts in a group working area or just relax a little from your last coding session.
It’s in the making and we promise it’s going to be awesome!

Cluster.title: Education Cluster
Cluster.body: An educational campus is an open and immersive space designed for a complete and comfortable immersion in the learning process. It is a creative and safe space, equipped with cutting edge technologies that foster collaboration, communication and teamwork. The total area of the academy is 4042 sq. m

Almaty.title: Almaty
Almaty.body: Surrounded by beautiful mountain ranges, Almaty is located in the southern region of Kazakhstan. The city is recognized as a southern capital with huge potential and is home to many technology companies and large enterprises. A place with excellent infrastructure, beautiful views and an unusual history, it is an ideal place to study and live.

PageName.title: Methodology
PageName.body: Unique approach to learning involves no books, no teachers but no more boredom. In fact it’s based on peer learning, individual growth and a lot of hands-on practice.

Peer.title: Peer Education
Peer.body: To be successful, participants must work in a team, share information, alternately be a student and then a coach. This approach helps to maximize the creativity of participants while working on projects.

items.title: Peer Learning
items.body: Collaboration is the foundation of pear learning. Cadets challenge each other, share ideas and experiences, and learn from each other. The training system provides tasks for which you need to find a solution.

items.title: Peer Review
items.body: A self-assessment system is established between the students, by which experts carefully study the project and evaluate it in accordance with the very nature of the project and the corresponding rating scale. When evaluating a project, you defend your point of view.

items.title: Peer Teaching
items.body: All cadets take on the role of teacher and student. When explaining something to other students, the cadet understands the material being explained better. Others can help and support the cadet if he has any questions.

Piscine.title: Piscine
Piscine.body: The Pool test will decide your final admission to Academie One. No swimming, but an immersion in the deep end of the code which allows us to identify the most motivated and to confirm the aptitude of the students. Piscine is actually a chance to discover the methodology, it's a unique learning method, and above all what programming really is.

items.title: New experience
items.body: A 4-week intensive course that will help you discover the academy, its unique teaching method and understand what programming really is.

items.title: Atmosphere of study
items.body: Once immersed in the academy atmosphere, you will write your first lines of code before moving on to the more complex exercises.

items.title: Problem solving
items.body: There will be a lot of trial and error to help you better understand the problem. You will study alone and in groups, asking for help from your fellow students, helping them and completing projects.

Program.title: Educational Program
Program.body: The curriculum is based on a gamified self-learning platform in which cadets complete practical projects, acquiring knowledge while gaining experience in working in a team. The curriculum offers over 100 projects that are consistently updated to reflect the latest industry standards. With ten different learning areas to choose from, students will move through two stages of learning at the Academie: fundamentals, and specialization.

Schedule.title: Your schedule at Academie One
Schedule.body: The training program requires a high degree of dedication. Cadets will spend an average of 40 hours per week working on projects over two years. Prospective cadets are strongly encouraged to develop strong time management skills. However, cadets are free to set their own schedule. The educational cluster will be open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

items.title: Fundamentals
items.body: After the pool, you will focus on command line interface projects, GO language fundamentals, and algorithms. The projects you work on will be the same projects that 01 edu system students all over the world complete. This stage is critical, as it lays the foundation for your future profession.

items.title: Specialization
items.body: Once you become more familiar with the basics of programming, you’ll begin working on significantly more complex projects that require more time and larger teams to complete. During this stage, you choose which field you want to specialize in.

Ability.title: Skills of the program
Ability.title2: That employers are looking for in digital world
Ability.body: The program generates a great diversity of co-creative digital talents highly valuable and sought-after to drive innovation and development, in all fields of digital transformation and technology.

PageName.title: Admissions
PageName.body: Entering an Academie opens up new doors and opportunities to discover your potential. There was a chance to change the usual learning and try something new. Welcome!

Road.title: Your Road To Academie One
Road.body: Before you can take off with coding at Academie One in Almaty there are some small steps you need to take. Buckle up and let's get started!

items.title: 1. Registration
items.body: Create an account on the 01 edu platform and try to complete two online games. You must reserve at least 2 hours to play. No coding is required – only logic.

items.title: 2. Interview
items.body: Take part in an online interview and introduce yourself. You will be asked several questions to help us understand your motivation.

items.title: 3. Piscine
items.body: Take a four-week course in an Education Cluster that introduces you to our educational model and identifies motivated candidates for Academie One.

ImportantDates.title: Important Dates
body: Meet the Team One in one the introduction meetings before you sign up for a piscine. You will receive a link for the introduction meeting when you finished the logic games successfully.
more dates for Piscines to be announced

CadetPath.title: Cadet Path
CadetPath.body: To apply, we only ask that you are open-minded, motivated and ready to commit to our 4-year educational and work program program and you must be at least 18.

Spec.title: Specializations and skills
Spec.body: Each project in the curriculum has been designed to learn a particular aspect of programming. By completing projects and mastering your skills you will develop your own unique competences and you will be prepared for diverse challenges and creative opportunities. Let’s dive a little deeper…

Portfolio.title: Create Your Own Portfolio
Portfolio.body: With the flexible curriculum at Academie One you take charge of your own skill set and create your very own portfolio depending on your interests and future plans.

Career.title: Career After Academie One
Career.body: Once you graduate from Academie One, you won’t just know how to code, more importantly you know how to effectively learn anything you want. So this means not only that you can bring your skills to any field and improve it, but that you can handle any new situation. You will be able to discover a new world of information technology. The Academie guarantees employment that will help you build your portfolio while still receiving salaries and good working conditions.

Alumni.title: Academie One Alumni
Alumni.body: We are just starting to work in Almaty, but all over the world there are other educational institutions working on the 01 Edu System platform. By teaching through this system, you immediately join the 01 Edu international community. In addition, this privilege provides great opportunities for future growth.
